scene_description_enriched: A scene depicts two figures within an architectural setting. On the left, a person dressed in white, possibly a cleric or a scholar, holds a book and gestures towards another figure. This second figure, seated on the right, wears a blue robe and a red cap, and is also engaged with a book placed on a yellow-covered lectern. Behind the seated figure, an architectural element with arched openings and decorative patterns is visible, suggesting an interior space. The overall scene appears to be an illustration from a devotional text, possibly depicting a moment of teaching or scholarly discussion.
